description: Test cases for booking confirmation and payment tracking

test_cases.name: Display Booking Confirmation Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation screen displays with checkmark (✅), venue name, and time

test_cases.name: Confirmation Message Display
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: Message shows 'Court booked: [Venue] • [Time]' and 'Notifications sent to joined players. Waiting for payments.'

test_cases.name: Payment Status Display
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: Payment status shows 'X of Y paid' (e.g., '2 of 4 paid')

test_cases.name: Request Payment Button
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: Payment request sent to unpaid players, confirmation or notification displayed

test_cases.name: Navigate to Session Detail
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Session Detail screen

test_cases.name: Open Session Chat from Confirmation
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Session Chat screen

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Booking
preconditions: User is on Booking Confirmation screen
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Booking time selection screen

test_cases.name: All Players Paid Status
test_cases.expected_result: Payment status shows '4 of 4 paid' or 'All payments received'

test_cases.name: Notifications Sent to Players
test_cases.expected_result: All joined players receive notification about booking confirmation
